comments.comment: Yes good catch! I fixed this in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/commit/6bd51b75eac4c6fd5b4f8f960d11bcb20e22156e>6bd51b7</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/glenn-jocher>@glenn-jocher</denchmark-link>
Why haven't you replied to my issue recently? I'm very concerned about your work.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Lornatang>@Lornatang</denchmark-link> sorry, very busy. Which issue is it? If you submit PR I can get them implemented a bit easier also!
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
